document_data.mainbody:
Droze was a fisherman and later the innkeeper of The Mermaids Purse in Corth, Aglarond, in the mid-14 century DR.
Droze was forced to change his occupation from a fisher to an innkeeper after suffering an accidental injury. He was known to often entertain guests at The Mermaids Purse inn, telling the story of rescuing a mermaid and being rewarded with three wishes from her king.
